title: C-01 Correction Code Execution Map
description: Maps C-01 correction codes defined in c-01_correction_codes.json directly to callable execution paths within the AGI kernel.

handler_path.description: File path or reference to the execution utility.

method.description: The specific function/method name to be invoked.

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum allotted time for execution before raising a critical C01-TIME error.
